    • Method Detail

      • getBaseUrl

        String getBaseUrl()
        Returns:
        the Base URL of the Fedora Repository that generated the message, e.g. http://localhost:8080/fedora

      • getPID

        String getPID()
        Returns:
        the PID or null if not applicable for the API-M method

      • getMethodName

        String getMethodName()
        Returns:
        the name of the API-M method invoked

      • getDate

        Date getDate()
        Returns:
        the Date object representing the timestamp of the method call

      • getReturnVal

        String getReturnVal()
        Returns:
        the return value of the API-M method invoked

      • getMethodParamVal

        String getMethodParamVal(String paramName)
        Returns:
        the value (as a string) of the parameter of the API-M method invoked. Return null if parameter not present.
